overview: This documentary accompanies the tennis legend throughout the extraordinary days around the Match in Africa: a once-in-a-lifetime event that led Bill Gates, Trevor Noah, Rafael Nadal, Roger Federer, and over 50,000 fans to the Cape Town stadium. It reveals the various facets of the match relating to Roger’s professional as well as personal life. A film about family, philanthropy, rivalry, friendship, and a spectacular world record.
title: Roger Federer – The Reunion
